Murasaki Shikibu bu onye édémédé akwukwọ na onye na-ede uri.
Ọ bụ ya dere akwụkwọ a na-akpọ Genji monogatari
E si n'akwụkwọ ahụ mara aha ya nke ukwuu n'ụwa nile.
Ọ mụrụ n'ọnwa n'afọ 973 n'obodo Heian kyo
Murasaki Shikibu onye nke nne na nna ya kpọrọ Fujiwara Tametoki.
